org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config

Class RepeatableConfigVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.BaseConfigVariable
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.RepeatableConfigVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepeatableConfigString

    public abstract class RepeatableConfigVariable
extends BaseConfigVariable
    Provides a base class for Configuration Variables that can take on multiple values. Consumers of this class must implement the add method.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.BaseConfigVariable

        spec

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected RepeatableConfigVariable(OptionSpec spec)
      Creates a RepeatableConfigVariable instance with the specified OpitonSpec.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void add(String value)
      Adds value as a value to this RepeatableConfigVariable.
      void addAll(String[] values)
      Adds every String in values as a value of this RepeatableConfigVariable by calling the add method with each String as an argument.

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.BaseConfigVariable

        addToCommandline, getSpec, matches

        public void addAll(String[] values)
        Adds every String in values as a value of this RepeatableConfigVariable by calling the add method with each String as an argument.
        Parameters:
